body.p: Complementing the MIPS support for SGI machines, stage 3 tarballs for Cobalt servers are now available, too, announces this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The Future zone has a project description for Kolab exchange server integration into Gentoo Linux, and Gentoo developers and enthusiasts will gather at the Boston edition of Linux World Expo this week. Watch the community section for news about the expat ABI breakage that caused some headscratching among users last week, and the security announcements and bugzilla statistics are not to be missed, either. Enjoy your newsletter!
